title: Best of The Herd: 04/16/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 04/16/2019
description:
Colin thinks Kevin Durant won’t survive in New York if he’s already letting Patrick Beverly into his head.  He thinks the Seahawks did the right thing giving Russell Wilson such a huge contract. He’s ready to bet the house that free agents like Kawhi Leonard will end up with the Clippers and not the Lakers if they move to LA.  Plus, NBA Champion Matt Barnes stops by to school Colin on some playoff hoops.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
